artist: Painter: After Jacopo Raibolini Francia; Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina
description: Mary holding child seated on a pedestal at center; St. Paul holding a book at left; John the Baptist at center below Mary; Mary Magdalene holding jug at right; towns left and right in distance
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription
below image in black: [Giacomi Francia dip.   F. Rosaspina del e inc./ MARIA VERGINE CON GESU BAMBINO/ E LI SANTI PAOLO, GIO BATTISTA, E M. MADDALENA]; in pencil on sheet: [1-428]
title: Maria Vergine con Gesu Bambino e Li Santi Paolo, Gio Battista, e M. Maddalena
